Name: jQueryBuddy_Beta2
Description: Snippet documents are now displayed in tabs and therefore more than one can be open at any time. The size of the results/help panels are remembered and whether they've been hidden/displayed. If there are unsaved changes the user will be warned when exiting the application and given the option to cancel.

Name: jQueryBuddy_Alpha9
Description: Fixed bug where the save dialog is shown twice. Seeing as snippets can now be saved, I'm going to mark this release as recommended.

Name: jQuery_Beta1
Description:
Fixed a bug introduced in the previous version where javascript errors weren't being identified at the correct lines numbers.

Also recommending this as a release since it seems pretty useful right now - I'm already dog-fooding it myself and, in fact, used it to develop the javascript .Dump() code I needed to integrate into it!!

Name: jQueryBuddy_Alpha6
Description: I've fixed up the intellisense now so there's now an object model inbetween the xml docs and the intellisense itself. This has meant I've now been able to include the method signatures and methods/properties are displayed when '.' is pressed and the selectors appear when " is pressed. I've changed the instant help window from a FlowDocument to a WebBrowser so the docs display better and examples are also displayed (although there's a little more work required on those and I'm think of changing it so the examples are actually loaded as snippets to run (F5) rather than just display.a

Name: jQueryBuddy_Alpha5
Description: Refactored the code completion for jQuery and fixed bug that meant the instant help at the bottom of the screen wasn't being displayed

Name: jQueryBuddy_Alpha2
Description: This version improves the jQuery intellisense so the method/properties names are now readable in the list and not merged with the category list. The description box takes a step toward showing the full method format and description with text colouring.

Name: jQueryBuddy_Alpha1
Description: This is the first release of jQueryBuddy with very little attention made to 'polishing'!! It has rudimentary intellisense and instant help for jQuery.

Name: jQueryBuddy_Alpha7
Description: This version has added the .Dump() method to the javascript Object to provide a convenient way to display the state of objects in the results window.
